Uses of Class
model.Keyboard

  • Packages that use Keyboard 
    Package Description
    abstracts  
    menus  
    model  

    • Uses of Keyboard in abstracts

      Methods in abstracts with parameters of type Keyboard 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void GameMenu.update(Keyboard keyboard)
      update Sends an update with the keyboard input

    • Uses of Keyboard in menus

      Methods in menus with parameters of type Keyboard 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void StatusMenu.update(Keyboard keyboard)
      update Unused by StatusMenu, nothing to update
      void StartMenu.update(Keyboard keyboard)
      update Starts the game when T is pressed
      void PokemonMenu.update(Keyboard keyboard)
      update Updates the pokemon on screen when the left or right key is pressed
      void Menu.update(Keyboard keyboard)
      update Updates the screen when up and down keys are pressed, or if the selection key is pressed
      void ItemMenu.update(Keyboard keyboard)
      update Updates the menu when left or right keys are pressed, to show the new item.
      void EndMenu.update(Keyboard keyboard)
      update Restarts the game when the R key is pressed
      void AchievmentsMenu.update(Keyboard keyboard)
      update Handles keyboard and achievement logic

    • Uses of Keyboard in model

      Methods in model with parameters of type Keyboard 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Trainer.handleMovementRequest(Keyboard keyboard, Map map)
      handleMovementRequest(Keyboard keyboard, Map map) Tells the engine that the player has attempted to move, and handles if the square they are attempting to move into is a solid object or ground they can walk on.
      void Battle.runAway(Keyboard keyboard)
      runaway() The pokeman runs away, ending the battle.
      void Battle.throwBait(Keyboard keyboard)
      throwBait() Throws a piece of bait, resetting the enemy's angry counter, and adding to their eat counter.
      void Battle.throwBall(Keyboard keyboard)
      throwBall() Throws a pokeball, attempting to catch the pokeman.
      void Battle.throwRock(Keyboard keyboard)
      throwRock() Throws a rock, resetting the enemy's eat counter, and adding to their angry counter.
      void Battle.update(Keyboard keyboard)
      Updates the battle screen whenever a key is pressed and the screen changes.
      void Trainer.update(Keyboard keyboard, Map map)
      update(Keyboard keyboard, Map map) Updates the player's position on the map based on the keys input.
